rules_text:
Whenever another creature with base power 1 or less enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on New Tensuo Luminary. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Reflect {3} [i]({3}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Elf Knight without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
